DEAR SIR OR MADAM


PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL


It is with heart full of hope that I write to seek your help in the context below. I am SAMINI ABACHA the son of the former Nigerian Head of state late GENERAL SANI ABACHA whose Sudden death occurred on 8th of June 1998.


Having gotten your particulars from the family's library, I have no doubt about your capacity and good will to assist me in receiving into your custody (For Safety) gold of 150 kilo and the sum of US$20Million willed and deposited in my favor by my late father as the next of kins. This money is currently kept in a Trust Deposit Account in West African Ghana in a security company.


Mohammad Abacha, is my elder brother he is the son of the first wife of my father,which he and his mother have all most claim all my late father property which the family did not have or see any left for us,my mother told me that my father kept all this for me in the security company which she, her self can not claim it for me just because i m the next of kins and my name is on the document ,please you are my hope you are the daddy i have for now, i want you to help me , i know i am too young to collect it and when they get to know that,i may not be able to claim it for my self again,


daddy please stand for me to get this out from this security company,i came to GHANA just for you,when i had you are capable to help me on this fund and Gold, i believe that you are the only one that can collect this fund for me and the gold, and daddy then you will invest with it for me, i have mother and two sister which they are not living in good condition,just we did not see anything from my late father property all that we have is the house we are living in,my late father build it for my mother when they get married,and she is the 5th wife of my late father, that is why will are having problem,my mother is from the eastern part of Nigeria, some of my late father wives are from Saudi Arabia, Kano party of Nigeria etc, they are about five wife and my mother was the last.


I did not come to Ghana with air, i take the road just because i don't want the press to know my presences here, so that make me not to come with my international passport not for any one to know who i am or my identity ,i m still in Ghana daddy i need your help,if any way you can help me, please i wait to hear from you,THANKS


REGARD AND GOD BLESS
SAMINI

messages.body:
Mr. Mensah,


In way of introduction, I am Lewis D. Noogie, an International Hotel Consultant, currently working here in the Russian Federation. You were recommended to me by a Mr. Aye Alani, General Commander of Police and Fraudulent Investigator, to prosecute Mr. Mohammed Abacha in the high court of your country.


Before I decide if you are the attorney that I want, I would like to ask a couple of questions:


1. Is there any chance of me recovering the $17,000 that I gave to Mr. Abacha to help him move a sum of money out of Nigeria?


2. What is the maximum sentence I can count on Mr. Abacha receiving? In my opinion there is nothing too extreme for this man, up to and including a slow, painful execution.


3. Is there anything that can be done to prosecute his younger brother Samini? He recently contacted me to try and get more money out of me and he is currently in Ghanna.
I look forward to your response on these issues.


Sincerely,
Lewis D. Noogie

messages.body:
Hi Mr. Mensah or whatever your real name is,


My name is Maya Bushburn, and I am Lewis Noogie's Administrative Assistant. I'm just back from vacation and Lewis asked me to send you $650 from the Irkutsk Western Union. Lewis is so naive when it comes to money so I take care of all of his financial matters and I try not to let him get into too much trouble. That said, we have a problem here.


Assuming that what Lewis tells me is correct, I see that you are trying to pull a simple 419 scam on him. I'm quite familiar with these scams as I have two close friends who have been fleeced by them, one of them being Lewis when this guy who claims to be Mohammed Abacha took him for more than $17,000. Now that I know what is going on here, your scam attempt is over.


Or maybe not. This could be a good opportunity for both of us.


You see, Mr. Mensah, Lewis doesn't pay me very much for the work that I do for him and I am always having to look for ways to augment my income. With this in mind, I'm willing to let you continue your scam with Lewis but only if I make some money out of it.


My suggestion is this - I'm sure that once you receive this $650 you'll think up other reasons for him to send more money. There is no Western Union here in Gadyukina so Lewis will have to give me the cash and send me to the Western Union office in Irkutsk. So here's the deal - I'll send you 30% of what he gives me to send to you and I'll keep 70%. Every time you ask him to send you additional money. I will tell Lewis it's ok and the same percentages will apply.


So that's it. If you agree, you'll get some money. If you don't agree, I tell Lewis you're scamming him and you get nothing.


Hope to hear from you soon Mr. Mensah.

 
Maya

Mensah, dear boy, let me try again to explain the situation here. I can't send you $200 today. The nearest Western Union office is in Irkutsk and I'm still a 6-hour drive from there, even more because of this storm. I'm in a small town called Tula which is between Irkutsk and Gadyukina. We have a season here called 'Winter' and during winter we get this white stuff falling out of the sky that we call 'Snow'. Sometimes we get lots of snow, like now.It can be very difficult and dangerous to drive in. There is about 3 feet of snow on the road to Irkutsk so I can't get there today, capice?


Here's what we're going to do. I'm going to go back to Gadyukina tonight. Lewis is going to give me $2000 and, if you hurry up and send him an email saying that you can arrange for Mr. Abacha to have his gruel poisoned, he will give me an additional $7500 to send you. Then, when this storm is over and they have the roads cleared, I will make the trip to Irkutsk to send you your $3045 which is 30% of the total amount we will have so far. I guarantee you'll have your money before the weekend, probably around Wednesday.
This is like talking to a kid. Do you understand all of what I'm telling you?


Ok, so you send Lewis an email today and tell him you can have Mr. Abacha taken care of. I'll handle everything from this end.

 
Maya
